TEXT.TITLE: CREDIT NATIONAL ISSUES 100 MLN DLR EUROBOND
TEXT.BODY: Credit National is issuing a 100 mln dlr eurobond, due April 23, 1992 with a 7-3/8 pct coupon and priced at 101-5/8 pct, LTCB International said as lead manager. The bonds, guaranteed by the French government, will be issued in denominations of 5,000 dlrs and will be listed in Luxembourg. Gross fees of 1-7/8 pct comprise 5/8 pct for management and underwriting combined and 1-1/4 pct for selling. REUTER
